attributes.action: Close Schools For a certain amount of time amidst Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details:
Teachers have to come to school as usual but then run lessons using a webcam to show the whiteboard and use a video calling service like Zoom, Google Meet and Microsoft Teams. This will allow learning to go ahead like usual but only the teachers will be at school.

This is vital to stop the spread of the disease to other people like parents, grandparents and teachers.
attributes.background: Close all schools, universities and Colleges until the beginning of December. Only the children of key workers and children who struggle to stay at home may come to school, universities and Colleges.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
